INVITATION_MESSAGE_SET: Sending share invitation message, please wait
FREE_BACK_TEXT: Please fill in your email address so that we can reply you.
E_WEILINK_MESSAGE_1: e-WeLink is a free universal smart home APP.  It allows you to remote control and manage your favorite smart devices of different brands in a single App.
E_WEILINK_MESSAGE_2: It supports to monitor real-time device status, set different timing tasks, share control and set scene to trigger on/off.
E_WEILINK_MESSAGE_3: With eWeLink, you can dim or increase brightness, change colors for RGB LED. You can monitor temperature, humidity or other environmental data for SC and TH devices. You can check power consumption for your home appliances, and much more!
DEVICE_ERROR_NOT_BELONG_BRAND: Device does not belong to this brand
NO_TIMER_PERMISSIONS: No permission yet, please ask device owner for permission to edit timer
Operation_records_detail: Hardware and share control operation notification
FAIL_TO_SEND_SMS: Failed to send verification code, please try later
NO_TIMER_DELAY: No countdown timers yet, tap on below button to add now!
NEST_ACCOUNT_NOT_HAS_DEVICE: No nest devices can be added
LONG_PRESS_TO_STUDY: Press and hold the button to enter into learning mode
RF_BRIDGE_LEARNING_STATE: RF bridge is in learning mode, please press the RF Remote button or let the alarm device go off in 1 min.
RF_BRIDGE_NOT_STUDY: The button has not been learned yet
TIMER_SET_DHM_ZERO: Time error, please don’t set outdated timer
RF_BRIDGE_NO_HAS_REMOTE: Click below button to add RF Remote
SCENE_EXECUTE_EXECUTE_ALL_SELECT_KEEP: You can’t set all channels’ status as Keep
CUSTOM_COLORS_TEXT: (Press and hold DIY to save selected color or color temp)

beijing_temp_small_less: The second value must be smaller than the first.

goto_rfbridge_know_more: Enter RF Bridge details, learn more at Alarm History
nest_account_changed: Changing Nest account will delete the added Nest device, continue?
you_can_create_scene: You can create scenes to turn on/off a gang of devices with one tap.
you_can_create_smart_scene: You can create scenes to trigger on/off the devices by the data range from sensors or by the status changes from other device.
let_your_device_operate_automatically: Let your devices operate automatically, you can even get rid of the phone.
sure_device_closer_wifi: Please make sure your phone and the model are closer enough to WiFi router.

PARAMS_IS_NUMBER_ONLY: This parameter can only be entered into the integer!
ADD_DEVICE_FAST_MODE_MESSAGE_1: Power up the model, then press and hold pairing button for 5s until the led indicator blinks twice and on repeatedly.
ADD_DEVICE_FAST_MODE_MESSAGE_2: For LED or humidifier, please repeatedly turn on and off the model for 3 times, the time gap is 2s. The led indicator will blink quickly.
ADD_DEVICE_Compatibility_mode_message_an: Power off the model, then power it up. Press and hold pairing button for 5s until the led indicator fast blinks. Release your finger. Then press and hold the pairing button for another 5s until it fast blinks continuously. For LED or humidifier, please turn on and off the model for 3 times, then turn on and off for another 3 times.
ADD_DEVICE_Compatibility_mode_message_io: Power off the model, then power it up. Press and hold pairing button for 5s until the led indicator fast blinks. Release your finger. Then press and hold the pairing button for another 5s until it fast blinks continuously. For LED or humidifier, please turn on and off the model for 3 times, then turn on and off for another 3 times. Please follow below instructions.
first_larger_second: The number of the first space is no less than second spaces
new_no_device_alert: There are no devices paired."Tap the add" device button below to begin pairing devices

BEI_JING_UNSER_THAN_CLOSE: When lower than this value, turn on

LAN_HELP_DIALOG_DESC: When your smart device and smartphone connect with a same network, you can use the LAN (local area network) to add and control the smart device.
LAN_HELP_DIALOG_SUPPORT_DEVICE_TITLE: Only some of the switches and sockets support LAN in latest App version.
ez_input_verify_code_alert: Your video has been encrypted, please enter password to watch. Initial password is the verification code on the model's tag. If there is no such a tag, please enter ABCDEF(case sensitive).
ez_7_days: The message can be saved for up to 7 days
qr_scan_no_permission: Your camera lacks permission, you are not allowed to use QR code scanning function. Please go to System Rights Management to allow permission.
